Description: Built 1978 & exquisitely rebuilt 2008-everything but front foundation! No expense spared. Gourmet kitchen w/custom cabinets granite counters 6-burner range top doors to wraparound deck. Dream master suite w/attached den & luxury bath. 2-story marble foyer recessed lighting extensive moldings finished walk out basement to flagstone patio. Possible in-law suite on main level. Open floorplan!
